Summary: UFO spotted on 422 East heading towards Oaks
divs: Sighting Details1) Driving on 422 East between Trooper and the Oaks Exits (directly across from the Christian Academy but on the Valley Forge side of the road. 2) Unusal, very before spotted in that area. 3) From far away it looked like a raido tower, but there was 3 white lights and no red flashing light. 4) 20 ft off ground, object did not move while I was watching. There was three white ligths (not blidning however I could not see above the side of the UFO). 5) Called my friend who was following me to make sure she saw it too. She did and we both were in complete shock. She first thought it was a fighter jet however when we got closer there was no markings, no color, no amo and it did not move. 6) Continued to drive on 422.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Oaks
There were no other sightings in Oaks on or around August 5th 2011
